result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven L. Gardner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. 
6 days credit if revoked from probation. 
22CF544 dismissed and read in.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven L. Gardner

records.addlTxt: See plea hearing for details as to the waiver.

9:00 AM cases 22CF278, 22CF544, 22CF591 called. Defendant Steven L. Gardner in court.  Attorney Melissa M. Petersen in court for Steven L. Gardner.  Attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State in compliance with victim notification requirements. There is an agreement. In all files: Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver.  Information in each case to be filed by the State will mirror the criminal complaints. Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. 
In 22CF278: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1 as charged in the Criminal Complaint. 
In 22CF591: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1 as charged in the Criminal Complaint. 
Court accepts pleas and finds the defendant Guilty. Anything else is dismissed and read in. 
Court withholds sentencing is placed on Probation for 2 years with conditions: 
Maintain absolute sobriety. Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide a DNA sample. 
60 day in Jail with Huber/EM, all Stayed pending further order of the court- Applies to Count 1 in 22CF278 only. 
Defendant to pay court costs including the DNA surcharge. 
Defendant has 53 days credit in 22CF544 and 6 days in 22CF591 if revoked from Probation.

Conditions: 
No acts or threats of violence.

ADDRESS INFO for Steven L. Gardner
Current: 4933 Kappus Dr, Eau Claire, WI 54701 United States  (Effective: 09-01-2022)
Prior: 2217 Peters Drive, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States
Letter to defendant with amended signature bond ordered by court 08/11/2022. Request to return signed bond and Affidavit of Witness form to Clerk of Court no later than 08/22/2022.

Conditions: 
No acts or threats of violence.

Court Order to amend bond and conditions of bond to remove the condition of no contact with K.G. and add the condition of no acts or threats of violence. All other conditions of bond shall remain in effect until further order of the Court.
Plea hearing on September 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Plea hearing on September 8, 2022 at 11:30 am.
